Funny_TO_DO.name: Drive Around In A Clown Costume”
Funny_TO_DO.description: You’ll be noticed plenty just by wearing the costume, but if you really want to draw attention to yourself then drive a convertible or honk when passing groups of people. Just remember not to traumatize any children in the process!

Funny_TO_DO.name: Eat Vanilla Pudding Out Of A Mayo Jar
Funny_TO_DO.description: It’s really too bad they don’t readily sell vanilla pudding in mayo jars – a business idea here? I’d highly recommend using an empty mayo jar, unless you like to mix your pudding with mayonnaise.

Funny_TO_DO.name: Call Someone To Tell Them You Can not Talk Right Now
Funny_TO_DO.description: This funny bucket list idea will leave them confused for a good while. Even better if you call someone you’re actually feeling like talking to – you never know if they’ll get confused enough to call you back.

Funny_TO_DO.name: Go Streaking
Funny_TO_DO.description: Choose carefully where you plan to execute your streaking plan, because in an unlucky case you might get fined for this one. But when done right, it’s fun and empowering – and, yeah, totally racy.

Funny_TO_DO.name: Jump Into A Taxi, Then Shout “Follow That Car!
Funny_TO_DO.description: This one is best played if you have not determined in advance which car you’re talking about. Just point in a random direction, and if the taxi driver asks which car, on the spot choose one.

Funny_TO_DO.name: Ask Someone “Do You See That Cow Barking or is it Just me?”
Funny_TO_DO.description: And you definitely ought to do this one of the funny bucket list ideas when there are no cows in sight to truly amp up the madness of the question. Bonus points if you poise the question to a total stranger
